posts.description: A woman with a purpose is much better than just a pretty face or nice body. Be a woman with class and substance. Let the exterior beauty be a compliment to your inner beauty. As the new year approaches it’s the perfect time to become more focused on the importance of consciousness & spirituality. Holistic loving, health, fitness, mental strength & spirit are all vital components of thriving in life. Be a light & show others your inner spirit. Share kindness & radiate happiness. That is true beauty 🙏🏻💗🙌🏻💕

It feels so magnificent to be back! 🙏 Life is all about the journey. We can accomplish anything we put our mind to as long as we have unwavering faith and belief. Giving up is never an option. 💪Happy Friday loves! Have a wonderful weekend ❤️🌹
Have a beautiful night! Blessings & love! 😄🙏
I love Bali. 😍🌊 Where is on your bucket list to travel to?
Food for thought 🙏

I haven't posted for a very long time because I went through something very difficult recently. The hardest part was what my kids had to endure by seeing their mother like this. No child should ever have to experience the fear of thinking they may lose their parent, their protector. Now that the worst is over and I'm back home I finally am posting to share my story. Biotoxin poisoning is very serious and life threatening. When we're silent, we lose our power and that's never something I'm willing to do. I want to share exactly what happened and what we overcame because I want to do all I can to ensure that this never happens to anyone else. I pray that by sharing what I overcame in the face of the most insurmountable odds, it will hopefully inspire others to know that no matter what you face, it is truly possible to overcome anything if you refuse to give up. I have been posting small snippets of my journey back on insta story & snap but I will be sharing exactly what happened & showing what I've done & what I'm doing to reclaim my health. Health is everything and it effects every aspect of life. I lost some huge opportunities due to being sick from this biotin poisoning and a lot of relationships. But I am a fighter. I am a warrior. I never give up. Now I pray that by seeing my story you'll know that no matter what you may be dealing with, it is possible to persevere and overcome. Wishing you all the very best. 🙏🙌

Strong is sexy. When you create your own success & work hard to achieve your dreams, you feel more confident. I graduated with a BA in Marketing and I had many academic honors including Dean's List and National Dean's List, and Who's Who in America's Colleges & Universities. I had both of my kids in college & raised them on my own while I was a full time student and I worked at American Express in financial advising and Coca Cola in Marketing. I graduated in 4 years and I overcame many obstacles without letting any of them stop me. I went back and got a second degree in Behavioral Science after we moved to California. I believe intelligence and strength is much sexier than most of the current fads which people are focusing on. It's time to applaud inner beauty, intelligence, and celebrate girls who achieve in sports and business. I was an athlete since I was very young. I began gymnastics & ballet when I was 2. I ran track and was a cheerleader since middle school. I became the youngest NFL Cheerleader in high school and I continued track into my first year of college. There is no limit to how much you can achieve. Set your goals and believe in your dreams. You can accomplish anything you set your mind to. 🙏
Car shopping. What's your favorite car?
Last week 💛

Such a magnificent experience visiting Xunantunich. The powerful energy was phenomenal. Such an amazing energetic vortex & unforgettable experience with my family. 🙏💙✨ We visited Caracol & the epicenter of the ancient Mayan world. Belize once was home to more than 2 million Mayas. Sacred temples, pyramids, advanced science, agriculture, mathematics, palaces, & historic structures.
It's crazy how the things that happen can make you appreciate the little things so much more. This shoot was before getting sick 💙

We live in a time where it should be celebrated when females are intelligent and powerful. Mothers should always teach their daughters to attain their own wealth and achieve their own success. Intelligence and power is much sexier than being the gf of someone who has fame or power.

🍾🥂🎊 My comeback event was epic!! 🎊🍾🥂
****************************
Celebrated

When you're selective you know what you deserve. You can't give someone time or attention who is not on your level. You can't allow pity or obligation so that a person won't get their feelings hurt when they're rejected cause you to give them attention or time that you otherwise wouldn't. A king and queen are a perfect match. A queen does not match with a jester. A jester will peacock and try to convince the court that they are more than a jester, but that is all they are. They will thrive off the little attention they were ever given and try to use it to manipulate they're next target to believe that they're better than they are because they were ever given attention by someone above their stature. They'll use the energy u gave them to seem better temporarily. When you're boss, u don't fraternize with the help. U align with someone who is mentally, spiritually, & emotionally on your level. You align with someone you can grow with, not someone you need to pull up to your level, because you will be pulling yourself down in that process. Once you find the perfect person, you don't waste your time trying to appease anyone's feelings or sugar coating. A real man makes men who try to convince others that they are better than they actually are look like immature little boys vying for attention. Real men are rare but once you find one, you appreciate them. You build with them. You love them. You nurture all of their amazing qualities and in the bond of reciprocal energy and union, an invincible strength is formed. You realize why any other person who came before them was simply showing you what wasn't good enough. You therefore appreciate them even more for who they are & how much greater you are for honoring your true self & refusing to settle. Any person can want to be in a relationship with you. The difference is knowing who deserves to be, because they are equally yoked with you. A man who puts God first & who has integrity, character, and true respect for women is a man who you can build a future with. A boy who is still searching for his own stability and station in life does not think or behave like a distinguished gentleman. He can't fathom the difference.
Love this photo from the magazine cover shoot I shot in Vegas. Happy Sunday ❤️😍😘

When we first moved to LA I was following a dream. I waited & finished college in hopes that my family would take the plunge to move with us. I was tired of cross country commuting and ready to live in California. I'd just graduated college with my BA in Marketing. I went to a private Christian University called Walsh on a track and academic scholarship. Well, I couldn't run track pregnant, so I worked my ass off while having my kids, and graduated on the National Dean's List. I would take my babies to school and even breastfeed in class. But I never gave up. My kids were all that mattered so my college years were raising them, school and working. When we moved, we were starting over. No furniture. We had nothing material but we had everything that mattered - LOVE. I look back at that time with awe at how much was accomplished, and how much was overcome. Nothing comes remotely close to my children and my love for them. I don't post 99.99 percent of life, and the things that are important to me wouldn't get a lot of likes. Social media is social. It's not where I pour out my heart or showcase the moments closest to my heart. My kids are my heart. This post is important to me. I love you both and I'm so proud of you guys. Then, now and always, you inspire me and you give my life meaning. You give me purpose and everything I do is to make sure you guys never have to struggle or experience the difficult things that I did. This is just the beginning. 💛 I love you infinity @taylorgiavasis @_jordankemp 💖💖

Life is like a love affair. The more you love it, the more it loves you back. The beauty of it is your thoughts control everything. You can achieve anything you believe. Focus on the positive & intentionally create the life of your dreams.

To be yourself in a world that is constantly trying to make you something else is the greatest accomplishment. ~
Ralph Waldo Emerson.
The right woman can come into your life and make everything better. She will see the greatness within you and inspire you to be the best version of yourself. ❤️

I had the greatest time at the @abrahamhickspublications workshop. Pure positive energy. I don't post often because most of my time is living my purpose & focusing on my family. Since the majority of what I do is based on health, wellness & spirituality, I will finally be sharing more 🙏🦋 I think it's the things that have no materiel value which matter the most. It's time for a shift. I think people are ready to celebrate substance & intellect instead of silicone parts & “reality" derived fame.
Such an amazing trip to Paris with my son!! ❤️🇫🇷 @_jordankemp

My baby boy turned 16 today! 😍😍🎉🎁🎉🎁❤️❤️❤️ @_jordankemp

This has been the most amazing trip to Europe. So thrilled to make these memories with my son. I got a DNA test which showed I'm 80% European. 35% British. ❤️@_jordankemp such a wonderful time exploring the exquisite beauty & culture in Europe. 😍❤️🇫🇷
I'm missing this magical city! Where are you from?

This summer we finally moved into our home after a couple tumultuous years. We overcame enormous difficulty & tragedy which included nearly dying from mold in our last home that rendered me incapacitated. I couldn't host my talk show, run my magazine or even see or walk. We ended up destitute and nobody came to our rescue. I was in court for several years and I won every case because many people in LA assume that others don't know their legal rights. I do know the laws and I refuse to be taken advantage of. I worked my butt off to provide for my kids and literally started from scratch with no health and no job or money. I rebuilt from square one and within a year I was able to turn things around. Losing several years of time is considered tragic in Hollywood, which is obsessed with youth. I'm now older and wiser. I now know the value of health, and I have an enormous passion to spend every possible moment with my kids. This may be boring to most but to me I would rather stay home every day than to be out doing things that don't matter with people who don't care. I share this in hope that it inspires anyone who may be going through a rough patch where things seem dismal and hopeless because it's true that anything is possible. You can overcome anything, no matter what the odds, just never give up. My journey is now just beginning because it's only been a couple months since the surgery to remove the blood clot and I am so excited for what the future holds. God bless everyone. 🙌

The feeling when you relinquish attachment to all material things because you realize that the intangible realm of love, belief, connection, energy & vibration is far more significant. Your perspective, faith & focus make all the difference. Bask in the sun. Enjoy the little things. You'll realize they are the big things. Live & love ❤️🌅☀️🏞🌺

Act like a lady, think like a boss, respect yourself like a queen. All ladies are bosses, queens and goddesses. It's time we unite and start a revolution. Let's make a shift now. Own your power and celebrate the beauty of being confident, intelligent, & independent. Don't follow the nonsense shoved down our throats from tv and social media from people popular in "reality tv." That phase of bs is crumbling quickly because it isn't real. Celebrate your natural beauty, mind, spirit and integrity. Don't be forcefed insecurities from marketing gurus trying to sell the lies of superficial exterior body parts. It's a nonsensical, impossible ideal to look up to and it's artificial programming. Don't buy into it. Don't believe the hype. You aren't who you date so never try to associate with people for superficial reasons. Who cares about girls that get temporary fame for who they date. It's time to celebrate the women who stand for something and attain success through their own work and merits. It's time to celebrate true queens! You are more than enough just as you are. ✨🙏👸🏻👑 Never let anyone tilt your crown. Hold your head high and walk in confidence. It may take longer to take the more self respecting, virtuous and truly authentic route, but it's always lonelier at the front when you're leading instead of following. It's far more fulfilling to achieve your dreams with your soul intact, than to lose yourself following the herd that's being led by false idols who have no substance or value. I support you my queens. Love and light ❤️✨🌺

When you find someone who stimulates your mind & truly understands & appreciates that you're vastly different than the crowd. (Sad to say that yes you're different from the unawakened who are still hypnotized by staying trapped in the matrix) then the already infinite limitlessness of possibility of what we create with our minds, intentions, beliefs, thoughts & vibrations increases exponentially. Its very cool to be YOUnique & its profoundly fulfilling when you find like minded souls on this Earth so when you find them, cherish them, & celebrate. Then go make magic & explore this beautiful wonder & joy as you have fun & utilize your true gifts to create & change the world for the better. ✨

To lead a beautiful life u must nourish your soul. Your home must be a peaceful place which is healthy, tranquil & safe wherein u recharge. U must stand up for the truth. It's only when people are afraid to speak out against liars & bullies that the bad guys ever win. Never give up. Never let anyone take advantage. Take the time for u to rejuvenate your health, mind, body & Soul. The stronger u are, the higher your vibration. Those energy vampires in the lower realms of vibration can't reach u because your frequency is simply too high above them. Live your truth & emanate love. Life is always a culmination of what we put out & those that knowingly hurt others or take advantage of kindness as weakness will always receive their full karma. Don't give them your energy. They don't deserve your time or any reaction. Rise above & always be a vessel of light & love. ✨💖

My baby is 20 today! I cannot believe 20 years have flown by this quickly. You are my purpose & you make me proud every single day. I know that being a parent is my calling & I'm so blessed that we incarnated into these roles together. My life has been brighter since you were in my belly & I still miss the times you were a baby but I'm so incredibly proud of the woman you've become. This is our first year away from each other on your bday & I'm so happy you're celebrating in such a beautiful way. The true testament of a person is how their kids are & I am truly proud that you & @_jordankemp are such phenomenal Angels. I love you agape infinity. @g1avasis

Radiate joy. Let your positivity shine. Your light is a gift. Your presence is priceless. Let your smile change the world. Glowing & emanating good vibes is the best way you can inspire others to live their truth, follow their bliss, & be free to live without fear. 💙🙏 Your external world is a representation of your inner thoughts. Love is always the answer 💙

I’ve been away a long time and I’m so thankful to be returning. Health is a blessing to never take for granted. Wishing you all a terrific Tuesday. I’ll be vlogging and finally sharing the full story very soon with a documentary about all my family endured and overcame to come back to life. The last procedure to save my health was yesterday. Thank you to everyone who stuck with me on this journey. Much love and light to all of you. Never take a moment for granted. Tell your loved ones how much you love them. Time is so precious. You never get it back. Don’t take it for granted. And never ever give up 🙏🏻💞✨

No matter what happens, there's always a lesson & an opportunity to learn & grow. Namaste 🙏🙌❤️ photo cred my baby ❤️ @g1avasis @thenakediaries

You should be able to turn heads fully dressed with no makeup on. If I have to compete with a girl that posts half naked then I'll happily lose 10 times out of 10. I'd rather get the right attention & reach the right people with my message than reach the people that want to see body parts. Any mannequin will look good in pictures & their purpose is to model the exterior only. Some girls may post that way & add pasted inspirations quotes but I would rather take longer, be a better role model & touch the right people with my own words, my heart, mind & spirit.

It's so easy to get off track but tenacity & perseverance are key to ensuring that you refuse to give up , no matter how hard things may get. Never let anyone stop you. Never let anyone's opinion define you. Always know that you have the power to achieve anything, regardless of what anyone else ever says or thinks. Your thoughts are the clay from which you make your masterpiece. Choose your thoughts & sculpt them with the precision of positive beliefs & expectations & you will create the life of your dreams. 🙏🏻

If you aren't shocked & appalled at the blatant disregard for justice & life that's been exhibited by those that are sworn to protect & serve us then it's time to wake up. There have been far too many innocent people whose lives have been destroyed predicated by whatever racism or bias the law enforcement officer had. This is a problem of humanity & we must stand united. The problem is not just race. Don't assume just because you aren't black that you're immune to possible injustice at the hands of those that are supposed to protect you. Our jails are overcrowded & our courts are filled with innocent people who got pushed into the justice system so police officers could get their monetary bonuses.

I've been passionate about helping to change & save the world since I was a kid. I was passionate about environmental engineering & was a member of The Junior Engineers of Texas Society in high school. I wanted to make a difference. I used to get so emotional that I would sometimes even cry when talking to my mom about people polluting the Earth or not recycling, & wishing I could make so many changes. In college, I became pregnant & I had both of my babies so I was able to teach them all I knew & all I was passionate about. Everything happens for a reason & I know that our home getting me so sick that I almost died also gave me much more time to stay home & focus on teaching my kids even more. Now I hope that through @g1avasis @thenakediaries @_jordankemp & all of their enlightened friends, we will keep making a difference & keep bringing awareness to the things that truly matter on this planet so we can have sustainable energy & resources & we can all focus on the love & bliss we came here to experience. We got deceived into thinking that money & fame are all that matter because we’re bombarded with it constantly through social media & those who hijack most of the attention. The more we awaken, the more we realize that money is just energy & as we unite & see that we’re all connected, we can learn that each person that crosses our path is meant to. Everyone teaches us something as they reflect back to us the things we need to change. Let's all do our part to pay more attention to what truly matters & to show more love & compassion to everyone. Namaste 🕉
Best bday ever! Of course spending it with my family was so special to me. Thank you all for the love! 😍🎂❤️🎉😘

I know it's not the best quality photos but this isn't for likes. Today is my dad's bday and he turned 87 years young. My dad was obviously not the youngest spring chicken when I was born but he has shown me the best example I could have of being a stable person and putting family first. No matter what has happened, my dad has been there and has taught me so much. He chose to put his children first and has stuck by that decision for over twenty years. We lost my two older brothers and he stayed strong and determined to be there for my younger brother and I no matter what. Even today it's the first time I'm not seeing him in so many years of thanksgiving traditions but speaking to him on the phone today made me so happy. It's the people in our lives that make all the difference and family is the most important. I know I've been able to be a strong source for my kids and be there for them and put them first because it's the example I saw. Values integrity and family are so important and I can't wait until these things that truly mattered are more celebrated. Today is also my grandmother's birthday. My father's mother. She was such a strong powerful woman. She also helped me to become who I am today. I still miss her. Dad thank you so much for being such a great father and role model. I love you. Sagapo Poli

I'm very honored to be featured in Entrepreneur as number 2 on the list of influencers to follow. Please see the full feature on Entrepreneur.com Thanks for all your continued support. There was quite a long time I was too ill & it feels great to be "back" finally. 🙏💙🙌

Having a relationship with someone means you are aligning yourself with them mentally, spiritually & emotionally. It's never just physical & being intimate with someone is never just casual. When you have sex with a person, you are binding with them. ALL of them. Who they've been with. Their sins, fears, karma, everything. This is why you must get to know a person or you could spend years UNDOING the affects of what you thought was a simple night of casual fun. Physical attraction is not enough. There are many beautiful shells externally who are internally revolting. If you could see their insides, you'd never look twice at them again, no matter how pretty that outer package may appear to be. Raise your vibration & transcend triviality. Don't follow the herd. Align with your twin flame. Be selective & wait for the person deserving to connect with you on all levels of intimacy. Then build with them in an unstoppable divine partnership of true love, connection & honesty.
Before and after that morning coffee 😜

This was 2 months after finally getting out of the ER after several years that were lost by fighting to stay alive & regain my health after biotoxin poisoning from my home almost killed me. I never want to feel sympathy or be a victim. I say lost because time is something you can never get back. I’m finally sharing my story because I want you to know that no matter what happens, you can overcome it and transmute it from your worst pain into your greatest strength as long as you never give up. The power of perseverance is essential. Believe you can achieve and you will. Never lose your determination, no matter what battle you may be fighting. And never ever let the world take your smile. Life is a gift. Cherish it 🕉💜💪🏼🙌🏻 Sending you all love and light 💟✨🙏🏻

We live in a time when most people look at the image someone is portraying & fall for that facade. When you find a rare woman whose internal beauty matches her external beauty, then you've virtually won the lottery. U cherish her bc you've found a jewel in a sea of made up imitations. It takes effort & persistence when you find the truth but it's worth the effort. A woman who has more internal beauty will not try hard to flaunt it nor will she be out in the scene. She doesn't need validation, she doesn't need anything externally. She knows her worth & the quality of treatment she deserves. She will expect to be pursued because she knows she's worth the effort. You only realize that by truly getting to know the real her which takes time. Only a king can value a true queen. A joker would keep trying to pursue other women even when he's found the rare opportunity to court a queen. He's led by his ego. He thinks conquest over many women makes him prove he's a bigger man. A real king finds a true queen & knows there is no further to look. He stops chasing other women because he knows this rare jewel is far greater than a conquest of 1000 empty "bad bitches" who only think of frivolous shallow materialistic things or about their external facade. They'll never better you as a man. When you find a queen & you make a true commitment to her, if you truly win her affection & create that powerful union, you then become like a God. Only the truly evolved, enlightened & wise will understand this. The rest will just keep chasing the pretty packages that have nothing inside. Yes everyone has learned to do makeup & get body & face upgrades. Cherish when you find a natural beauty whose internal beautiful soul outshines her beautiful exterior. Being humble & real is far better than constantly seeking validation through social media or otherwise. When you're real, you're living the moments, not staging them for posts just to get likes.

The last 3 years have been quite the journey. This trip to Colombia with my kids was the beginning of the first chapter in the new book of my life experience. Now it’s truly time to thrive! So excited for life and all the new beginnings. I finally get to share my story of what my family overcame. I pray by doing so you’ll be inspired to know that you can overcome absolutely anything. So ready for 2018! This will be the greatest year yet! It’s time to write your new chapter in your new book of life! You can achieve anything as long you believe it! Love and blessings ❤️✨

When virtue and modesty enlighten her charms, the lustre of a beautiful woman is brighter than the stars of heaven, and the influence of her power it is in vain to resist.
Akhenaton ✨

Ladies never feel you must settle when it comes to love & relationships. Whether it's the very first date & he is texting other girls or he's giving red flags or it's far into the relationship & he's not doing the things he did in the beginning to get you, never settle. There is a man who will love & cherish you like you deserve & who will only have eyes for you. He will appreciate his time with you & never do anything that could diminish it. The man who loves you will never divide his attention between you & other women & if a man does, he's not your king. You're a queen. You're a goddess. Expect to be loved & appreciated like the phenomenal woman you are. Never settle. Patience is truly a virtue & when you don't fill your life with time wasting fillers or fluffers, you leave room for you to better yourself in all facets & that is when you attract your true king. 👑👸💝

Wishing you a very magical weekend full of happiness & love. I'm finally feeling better. Thank you all for the love & support. I truly appreciate you & your patience. Being in control is very sexy. Embrace your strength. Celebrate your intellect. It's possible to be strong, smart and sexy.

We live in a time when people have become so transfixed by what's happening with celebs & social media figures that many have lost touch with what truly matters. We incarnated to this planet to make a difference. As kids we felt that magic of being alive. We played & didn't fear the present or future. With conditioning from authority figures & others we slowly lost our magic. Our dreams faded & we learned to focus on $ & survival. The system programmed us to become workers; not thinkers or creators. We learned to memorize & recite & got rewarded for it. It's extremely apparent that anything we think or do almost instantaneously manifests. It's time to stop following what's supposedly popular like sheep just bc we're bombarded with it on tv & social media. There's a faction that wants to keep us asleep, distracted & programmed. Having us eat unhealthy foods that poison us & keeping us glued to our phones so we are constantly receiving radiation, programming & monitoring that comes from holding them & staring almost uncontrollably. Its time to wake up & have true change. It's time to be unique & stop caring what people may think or who may like you. What matters in this life is fulfilling your purpose & helping to change the world for the better. We are killing our planet at an alarming, unsustainable rate. It's time to focus on bettering ourselves, bettering our planet, & doing our part so we experience the true heaven on earth that we're here to thrive in! It starts with us. Our thoughts are truly things & as we choose to shift & make a ripple effect, the world will quickly be a better place. Yes it seems daunting to see those in power controlling the politics & the $ etc, but in truth, we massively outnumber those in power. When we unite, empower ourselves & demand better for us, our children, the animals of this planet, & our future children, there's nothing those in power can do except be forced to change as well. We're the majority. We hold the power. 🙏✨👏 Honor yourself. Those meant to be in your world will attract to your vibration & your new group can help make a huge change which will inspire others

Positivity is a choice. Stressful & devastating things can happen. It's part of life. What matters is our perspective & what we choose to believe & do. The most successful people aren't simply blessed with no problems, but simply choose to persevere & overcome no matter what! You are never your past or what has happened to you! What you are is defined by you! Choose to be happy whether it's a good or bad day. Choose to appreciate every person & experience for what you've learned & never let anyone dim your light. I see the greatness in you & I send you blessings & encouragement. Finish out 2017 with all the passion & commitment you can to make it your best year yet! College days with my baby. It wasn't easy to have 2 kids in college but it was definitely worth it. I learned what truly matters at a very young age. I was never into partying so there was nothing for me to miss. I raised both of my kids by myself & I graduated from college in 4 years with National Dean's List Honors. It helped that I received college credit in high school with Honors AP classes. I was always considered a workaholic or a nerd and I'm proud of that because intelligence is beautiful. To me internal beauty of mind and spirit is what truly matters. We came from a small town in Ohio. I taught my kids everything I could & gave them the freedom to develop without limits and without judgments. My kids are my life. I don't have much of a social life and I choose for it to be that way. I would rather be my kids' driver & be there whenever they need me than be out at whatever trendy event. We live in a time where social media has so many people thinking they're missing out but when you know what truly matters, you realize it's the people so focused on impressing others who will never know the satisfaction of being happy internally. Never compare yourself to anyone else. Do what you love and focus on what you love. Your life is meant to be lived by you and not according to anyone else's lifestyle or standard. Don't get caught up with what's on TV or who is currently popular. Most of that is not real. Stay true to your beliefs and values. Choose a life with meaning. 🙏
Ball is life 🏀 who wants to play with me! 🙌😊

It's the greatest difficulties which are the greatest gifts because they allow us to realize just how strong & capable we truly are. Never be defeated. Never Give up. ~~~~~~~~~ I don't post my background but I do have a BA in Marketing & I'm a therapist. I'm extremely sensitive & spiritual which is why I don't go out often. I primarily have always focused on family, work & home. I'm not defined by my exterior. I'm first & foremost a mother. I love my family. I stay home. I stay out of the scene. I stay away from fake friends & opportunists. I don't try to portray any image. I actually keep all of the big things I do & the people I know a secret. I feel bad for the people who try so hard to portray themselves to be so big on social media. It's the people who value their privacy & who keep important things private who actually live the life that others love to pretend to live. When you have something valuable, you don't sacrifice it to the world by showing it to everyone. You protect it & that's how you stay successful & secure.
